item.title: BnPME
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Gene Symbol: BnPME Gene Name: pectinmethylesterase Genome: Species: Brassica napus Functional Descriptions: BnPME is progressively induced after microspore reprogramming to embryogenesis, correlating with pectin de-esterification and cell differentiation in Brassica napus.

item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Ghir_A08G004050.1 Gene Symbol: GhAOC2A Gene Name: allene oxide cyclase 2 Genome: Species: Gossypium hirsutum Functional Descriptions: Expression analysis of the GhAOC2 gene in HT-sensitive line (H05) and HT-tolerant line (84021) anthers at TS under NT and HT.

item.title: HvPDS
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: HORVU4Hr1G077450 Gene Symbol: HvPDS Gene Name: Genome: barley cultivar Morex V1 Species: Hordeum vulgare Functional Descriptions: Our previous study reported that knockdown of the barley phytoene desaturase gene HvPDS by virus-induced gene silencing resulted in a photobleaching phenotype in seedlings Agrobacterium-mediated transformation was performed on microspore-derived callus to target the HvPDS gene, and T0 albinos with targeted mutations were successfully obtained from commercial varieties.

item.title: MS2
item.description: Gene Details: Gene ID: Glyma.10G281800 Gene Symbol: MS2 Gene Name: Genome: Gmax_Wm82_a2_v1 Species: Glycine max Functional Descriptions: Natural variation of MS2 confers male fertility and drives hybrid breeding in soybean.
